snippet: With a month and a half until the voting begins, he still has not committed himself fully to trying to win Iowa, New Hampshire, South Carolina or Nevada.
abstract: Some backers of Sen Marco Rubio in early primary states of Iowa, New Hampshire, South Carolina and Nevada are urging him to campaign more vigorously to dispel impression that he does not need voters in those states to secure nomination; Rubio has so far declined to commit himself to trying to win any of those states, which many donors see as politically risky move that makes him seem indifferent.

byline.contributor: Jonathan Martin contributed reporting from Washington.

lead_paragraph: With a month and a half until the voting begins, he still has not committed himself fully to trying to win Iowa, New Hampshire, South Carolina or Nevada.

headline.main: Fretful Backers Push Marco Rubio to Pick a Must-Win Early Primary State
headline.print_headline: Fretful Backers Push Rubio to Pick a Must-Win Early State Among 4 Contests
